title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive: The evolution of AWS load balancing and new capabilities (NET334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨：AWS 负载均衡的演进与新功能 (NET334)
abstract: The session traces the evolution of load balancing on AWS, from early Elastic Load Balancing to today's high-performance, VPC-integrated architectures. You'll learn about the internal workings of how the Nitro System and Hyperplane power modern load balancers, examine how Application Load Balancer (ALB), Network Load Balancer (NLB), and Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) address distinct architectural requirements, and explore the latest NLB capabilities and enhancements. The session concludes with proven reference architectures and design patterns for building highly scalable, fault-tolerant AWS network infrastructures.
abstract_cn: 本课程追溯了AWS负载均衡的演进历程,从早期的Elastic Load Balancing到如今高性能、与VPC集成的架构。您将了解Nitro系统和Hyperplane如何为现代负载均衡器提供内部支持,探讨应用负载均衡器(ALB)、网络负载均衡器(NLB)和网关负载均衡器(GWLB)如何满足不同的架构需求,并了解NLB的最新功能和增强特性。课程最后将介绍经过验证的参考架构和设计模式,用于构建高度可扩展、容错的AWS网络基础设施。
